resources.string: Carnivals are a haven for blitz, glamour, fashion and style. You\'ve got to have them all if you want to rock the ramp and prove your haute couture quotient in À La Mode. Come with every bit of pizzazz you possess! Impress the crowd and the judges, and become the style icon of Effervescence 2016!
This is a sample rule. This is a sample rule
